title: Addition Binomial Square Formula
text: We compare our expression to the addition binomial square formula: $${\left(a+b\right)}^2=a^2+2a b+b^2$$.
speech: We compare our expression to the addition binomial square formula:  parentheses a plus b,  squared is equal to a squared plus 2 a b, plus b squared .

title: Identify $$b$$

title: Plug in the Terms
text: Substitute $$a=x$$ and $$b=\frac{2}{3}$$ into the addition binomial square formula:\n$${\left(a+b\right)}^2=a^2+2a b+b^2$$\n$${\left(x+\frac{2}{3}\right)}^2=x^2+\frac{2y\times2}{3}+{\left(\frac{2}{3}\right)}^2$$
speech: Substitute  a is equal to x  and  b, is equal to 2 thirds  into the addition binomial square formula:\n, parentheses a plus b,  squared is equal to a squared plus 2 a b, plus b squared \n, parentheses, x plus 2 thirds,  squared is equal to x squared plus, fraction, 2 y times 2, over 3,  plus, parentheses 2 thirds  squared

title: Simplify
speech: x squared plus 4 thirds x plus 4 ninths
